archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0030
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a new or existing customer, when I purchase a product, I want to have a role profile set for that product, so that it has the correct usage privaleges.

properties.value: Roles and privilages are set for a customer/user, not for each product OOTB we can define user/payer/owner involvement role during ordering and configure privileges accordingly

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
